As part of an advanced writing course I took in my senior year, I had to write an opinion piece on the same topic as I wrote an executive summary, advocating for a position on an issue. In my case, I was writing about the Nippon Steel takeover of US Steel, and was advocating for President Trump to allow the deal to go through. [Here](20250307_OpEd.pdf) is what I had to say.
